December 27, 1961
Mr. R. Edwin Browne
Director, KPKU
EES Building
University of Kansas
Lawrence, Kansas
Dear Ed:
I believe the enclosed memo to the Board is self-explanatory. I have
also enclosed the original document which is to be signed by you and
returned to me for presentation to the bank.
I have asked the Board to send each of us a copy of the signed resolution.
Since time is very important (i don't want to be in the position of having
no bank account upon which checks my be drawn for the Associationâ€™s
General Fund), I would appreciate it if you would execute the statement
for the bank as soon as you have a total of nine signed resolutions man
Board members - tliat win constitute a majority of the total membership
of 16 on the Board. I am hopeful that you will be able to return this
to me by January 8, but that will depend on how prompt all of the Board
members are.
Shanks for your help. 1*11 affix the HAEB seal after you have returned
the signed document for the bank.
Regards,
Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
HEEiabt
